item.title: Virtual poster presentations with blender
item.description: Around eight months ago, I submitted a poster to a small conference that had been moved onto a virtual platform due to the pandemic.

item.title: Old blog, new website (mousevr.blogspot.com)
item.description: Welcome to my new website. After a rather extensive hiatus from writing about my PhD work (Virtual Reality for Mice ), you will find some more information about me here.
